org.openjdk.tools.javac.main

枚举 Option

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Option>
      • org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.Option
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Comparable<Option>

    public enum Option
extends Enum<Option>
    Options for javac. The specific Option to handle a command-line option can be found by calling lookup(java.lang.String), which search some or all of the members of this enum in order, looking for the first match. The action for an Option is performed handleOption(org.openjdk.tools.javac.main.OptionHelper, java.lang.String, java.util.Iterator<java.lang.String>), which determines whether an argument is needed and where to find it; handleOption then calls process providing a suitable OptionHelper to provide access the compiler state.

    This is NOT part of any supported API. If you write code that depends on this, you do so at your own risk. This code and its internal interfaces are subject to change or deletion without notice.

    • 字段详细资料

      • primaryName

        public final String primaryName
        The "primary name" for this option. This is the name that is used to put values in the Options table.

      • names

        public final String[] names
        The set of names (primary name and aliases) for this option. Note that some names may end in a separator, to indicate that an argument must immediately follow the separator (and cannot appear in the following argument position.

      • argsNameKey

        protected final String argsNameKey
        Documentation key for arguments.

      • descrKey

        protected final String descrKey
        Documentation key for description.

    • 方法详细资料

      • values

        public static Option[] values()
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序, 返回 包含这些常量的数组。该方法可用于迭代 常量, 如下所示: 
        for (Option c : Option.values())
    System.out.println(c);
        返回:
        按照声明该枚举类型的常量的顺序返回的包含这些常量的数组

      • valueOf

        public static Option valueOf(String name)
        返回带有指定名称的该类型的枚举常量。 字符串必须与用于声明该类型的枚举常量的 标识符完全匹配。(不允许有多余 的空格字符。)
        参数:
        name - 要返回的枚举常量的名称。
        返回:
        返回带有指定名称的枚举常量
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - 如果该枚举类型没有带有指定名称的常量
        NullPointerException - 如果参数为空值

      • lookup

        public static Option lookup(String arg)
        Looks up the first option matching the given argument in the full set of options.
        参数:
        arg - the argument to be matches
        返回:
        the first option that matches, or null if none.

      • lookup

        public static Option lookup(String arg,
                            Set<Option> options)
        Looks up the first option matching the given argument within a set of options.
        参数:
        arg - the argument to be matched
        options - the set of possible options
        返回:
        the first option that matches, or null if none.

      • hasArg

        public boolean hasArg()

      • matches

        public boolean matches(String option)

      • handleOption

        public void handleOption(OptionHelper helper,
                         String arg,
                         Iterator<String> rest)
                  throws Option.InvalidValueException
        Handles an option. If an argument for the option is required, depending on spec of the option, it will be found as part of the current arg (following ':' or '=') or in the following argument. This is the recommended way to handle an option directly, instead of calling the underlying process methods.
        参数:
        helper - a helper to provide access to the environment
        arg - the arg string that identified this option
        rest - the remaining strings to be analysed
        抛出:
        Option.InvalidValueException - if the value of the option was invalid

      • process

        public void process(OptionHelper helper,
                    String option)
             throws Option.InvalidValueException
        Processes an option that either does not need an argument, or which contains an argument within it, following a separator.
        参数:
        helper - a helper to provide access to the environment
        option - the option to be processed
        抛出:
        Option.InvalidValueException - if an error occurred

      • process

        public void process(OptionHelper helper,
                    String option,
                    String arg)
             throws Option.InvalidValueException
        Processes an option by updating the environment via a helper object.
        参数:
        helper - a helper to provide access to the environment
        option - the option to be processed
        arg - the value to associate with the option, or a default value to be used if the option does not otherwise take an argument.
        抛出:
        Option.InvalidValueException - if an error occurred

      • getPattern

        public Pattern getPattern()
        Returns a pattern to analyze the value for an option.
        返回:
        the pattern
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if an option does not provide a pattern.

      • help

        protected void help(Log log)
        Writes help text for this option to the log.
        参数:
        log - the log

      • help

        protected void help(Log log,
                    String descr)

      • getJavacFileManagerOptions

        public static Set<Option> getJavacFileManagerOptions()
        Returns the set of options supported by the built-in file manager.
        返回:
        the set of options.

      • getJavacToolOptions

        public static Set<Option> getJavacToolOptions()
        Returns the set of options supported by this implementation of the JavaCompiler API, via JavaCompiler#getTask.
        返回:
        the set of options.
